original_text: It will be very bad for those people who expect that Egypt will help them. They think that Egypt's many horses and chariots will keep them safe. They trust the power of Egypt's strong soldiers who ride on horses. But those people do not trust the Holy God of Israel. They do not ask the Lord to help them.
korean_text: 도움을 구하러 애굽으로 내려가는 자들은 화 있을진저 그들은 말을 의지하며 병거의 많음과 마병의 심히 강함을 의지하고 이스라엘의 거룩하신 이를 앙모하지 아니하며 여호와를 구하지 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들에게는 매우 안 좋을 것이다

sentences.original_text: who expect that Egypt will help them
They think that Egypt's many horses
and chariots will keep them safe
They trust the power of Egypt's strong soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 애굽의 강한 군사들의 힘을 신뢰한다

sentences.original_text: But those people do not trust the Holy God of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 사람들은 이스라엘의 거룩한 하나님을 신뢰하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: They do not ask the Lord to help them
